room_title: Escape room "The Long Lost Pharaoh" by Rooms of No Return in Bakersfield
review: The room was decorated amazingly and staff were very friendly

room_title: Escape room "The Long Lost Pharaoh" by Rooms of No Return in Bakersfield
review: The decor of the room was fantastic. The actors were also great. The theme we did, Nightmare, was wonderful. We felt like the clues weren't very sequential and we spent a majority of the time just searching for items. The front desk ladies were also nice.

room_title: Escape room "The Long Lost Pharaoh" by Rooms of No Return in Bakersfield
review: We were really surprised on the amount of detail in the rooms and the complexity. The staff were super nice people. My impression was that is would be one room, but we actually had 3 rooms to traverse. You have to solve one part to get to the next part, and so on. It was worth it! We had the room to ourselves with our family. The kids really enjoyed the challenge as well. Just make sure you ask if it's kid friendly if you plan on bringing your kids.
